blogPost.excerpt: Previewed is a mockup generator which makes 3D accessible to everyone. Take snapshots from all angles and create animations that will engage your audience.
blogPost.body: Previewed is a mockup generator which makes 3D accessible to everyone. Take snapshots from all angles and create animations that will engage your audience.
blogPost.title: Previewed 3D - Pixel perfect 3D device mockups & animations
blogPost.author: Roman Rybintsev

localize.description: 预览是一款模拟生成器，它让每个人都能使用3D。从各个角度拍摄快照，并创建动画，吸引你的观众。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D设备模拟和动画。

localize.description: 預覽是一款模擬生成器，它讓每個人都能使用3D。從各個角度拍攝快照，並創建動畫，吸引你的觀衆。
localize.tagline: 完美的像素3D設備模擬和動畫。

next.excerpt: Popl is the next generation business card! 📲 Business people put our NFC sticker on their phones to instantly share contact info with potential clients.
next.title: Popl - Share your digital business card with a tap

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商务人士将我们的NFC贴纸贴在手机上，可以即时与潜在客户分享联系信息。
localize.tagline: 轻点一下就能分享您的数字名片

localize.description: Popl是新一代的名片! 📲商務人士將我們的NFC貼紙貼在手機上，可以即時與潛在客戶分享聯繫信息。
localize.tagline: 輕點一下就能分享您的數字名片
